review: Works like a charm. Your TV will of course need an HDMI jack and it will either have to have a USB jack or you will need to have an extra power outlet close by so you can plug the USB in for power. This works off of WIFI so you will need to be able to login to that. When we have several family members over we each look for funny clips or recent videos we shot and send it to the unit so everyone can watch it on the big screen. Will be buying another one for the other TV.
author: John Drouault

review: the screen share function is pretty sloppy and laggy which makes the whole product useless, the function it holds are all already integrated in the smartTV.
author: Ziyi Jiang

review: Absolutely love it I am able to watch almost everything from youtube to netflix on my big screen tv would recommend to everyone.
author: Betty Garcia

review: Chromecast works great comes with a Wall charger.

review: I couldn't install it. requires an expert to make it works

review: Works great. Set up was a breeze. I stream from my iPhone and have never had a problem with it. Awesome deal!!

review: This is a great invention. We use it all the time!
